transcript: it is so easy to win for everyone's like struggling to win it's like most of the pain that people experience is purely in their own minds emotional burnout which I think people mislabel as burnout when really it's just like they don't know how to reframe reality what it really is is they got a comment on a post that bugged them okay great it's embarrassing to even have to say that but when you say it then you admit it and all of a sudden you put it in the light and the shame kind of starts to evaporate because then you can name it and be like is this comment bigger than my future one of the things that has helped me was saying like what's true about this and the next one is like what if we confront it and say like what if they're right and yeah I'm still gonna do it anyways
